title.en: Neon Bloom: The Circuitry of Life

description.ko: 꽃잎은 액정 디스플레이로, 뿌리는 광섬유 케이블로 이루어진 매혹적인 꽃의 시각화로, 생체 발광 디지털 숲 속에서 빛납니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing visualization of a flower where petals are made of liquid crystal displays and roots are fiber-optic cables, glowing in a bioluminescent digital forest.

prompt: High-resolution digital nature photography, a hybrid orchid with holographic petals and glowing circuit board patterns, fiber-optic roots pulsing with blue data light, set in a dark cybernetic forest, 8k, photorealistic, intricate tech details, neon bioluminescence, FLORA-9 style.
